entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GenAPI incorrectly generates collection-based interface implementation #31570
  • Semicolons removed from TestRunParameters.Parameter value #31569

PullRequests

Created

  • Add the test that verifies generated join symbol with Ref to derived symbol can be evaluated correctly #31564
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Add support for new output path format #31454
    untriaged
  • Add breaking change notification to the bot #31413
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • corrected package version for `Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers` #31566
    Area-Containers
  • syncing the logic in `CreateNewImage` and `ContainerBuilder` #31542
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • containers: updated 7.0.3xx release notes #31543
    Area-Containers

Updated

  • Move asset compression to the StaticWebAssets SDK #31559
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2148401 #31526
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • First pass at source build pre-built detection #31341
    Area-Infrastructure
  • extend search table with trusted and owners info #31403
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Wasm SDK packed as a nuget package #31519
    Area-Infrastructure
